ssot__PrivacyConsentLog__dlm.name: Privacy Consent Log
ssot__PrivacyConsentLog__dlm.description: The Privacy Consent Log DMO represents information about a user's requested consent and privacy information.

ssot__ConsentActionId__c.description: A reference ID to the types of actions a user allows, like data collection.

ssot__ConsentTriggeringEventTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the task the user was performing when they provided a privacy consent decision.

ssot__ContactPointId__c.description: A reference ID to specific email address, phone number, or other contact method used to communicate with a party.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeviceLat__c.description: The north or south geographic coordinate of user's device during session.

ssot__DeviceLgtd__c.description: The east or west geographic coordinate of user's device during session.

ssot__EngagementChannelActionId__c.description: A reference ID to an activity or operation performed by channel.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the method of message delivery, for example an email, call, or ad.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__IndividualId__c.description: A reference ID to the account’s contact.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__PrivacyConsentActivityDttm__c.description: The date and time of activity that resulted in log entry.

ssot__PrivacyConsentLogCategoryId__c.description: A reference ID to category of privacy consent log, for example, profile or behavioral.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Privacy Consent Log DMO.

ssot__PrivacyConsentStatusId__c.description: A reference ID for the status of privacy consent, for example opted in or opted out.
